languages.text: "Тактическая ревизия экипировки завершена. Духи машин не подведут вас".
"The tactical equipment audit is complete. The machine spirits will not fail you."
languages.original_text: "Тактическая ревизия экипировки завершена. Духи машин не подведут вас".

traits.locale_text: "The tactical equipment audit is complete. The machine spirits will not fail you."

languages.text: “战术装备检查已完成，机魂绝不会让你失望。”
languages.original_text: "The tactical equipment audit is complete. The machine spirits will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: “战术装备检查已完成，机魂绝不会让你失望。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La auditoría de equipamiento táctico está completada. Los espíritus máquina no l{mf|e|a} fallarán».
languages.original_text: "The tactical equipment audit is complete. The machine spirits will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: «La auditoría de equipamiento táctico está completada. Los espíritus máquina no l{mf|e|a} fallarán».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「戦術装備の監査は完了した。機械精霊が陛下の期待を裏切ることはありません」
languages.original_text: "The tactical equipment audit is complete. The machine spirits will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: 「戦術装備の監査は完了した。機械精霊が陛下の期待を裏切ることはありません」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Überprüfung der taktischen Ausrüstung ist abgeschlossen. Die Maschinengeister werden Euch nicht enttäuschen."
languages.original_text: "The tactical equipment audit is complete. The machine spirits will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: "Die Überprüfung der taktischen Ausrüstung ist abgeschlossen. Die Maschinengeister werden Euch nicht enttäuschen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Audit de l'équipement tactique terminé. Les esprits de la machine ne vous abandonneront pas. »
languages.original_text: "The tactical equipment audit is complete. The machine spirits will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: « Audit de l'équipement tactique terminé. Les esprits de la machine ne vous abandonneront pas. »

languages.text: "Taktiksel ekipman denetimi tamamlandı. Makine ruhları bizimle."
languages.original_text: "The tactical equipment audit is complete. The machine spirits will not fail you."
